item.title: How do i reset levels with noclip stopper?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

I just made my own noclip stopper so when people with no rights use noclip it teles them out to the ship in wildy and they r stuck there.

I have disabled all teles but i am wondering how do i reset all the stats back to 1/1?

I did it so the go to 1/13 (what ever level they are) But i need it to go to 1/1.

If there is a tut plz post link if not plz post how.

Thanks and also I will give you credits on my server and Rep++ [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:58:22 AM[/size][hr]The level bit of the code that I have now is:

[code]playerLevel[0] = 1;

setSkillLevel(0, 1, playerLevel[0]);
playerLevel[1] = 1;

setSkillLevel(1, 1, playerLevel[1]);

playerLevel[2] = 1;

setSkillLevel(2, 1, playerLevel[2]);
playerLevel[3] = 1;

setSkillLevel(3, 1, playerLevel[3]);

playerLevel[4] = 1;

setSkillLevel(4, 1, playerLevel[4]);

playerLevel[5] = 1;

setSkillLevel(5, 1, playerLevel[5]);
playerLevel[6] = 1;

setSkillLevel(6, 1, playerLevel[6]);
playerLevel[7] = 1;

setSkillLevel(7, 1, playerLevel[7]);

playerLevel[8] = 1;

setSkillLevel(8, 1, playerLevel[8]);
playerLevel[9] = 1;

setSkillLevel(9, 1, playerLevel[9]);

playerLevel[10] = 1;

setSkillLevel(10, 1, playerLevel[10]);

playerLevel[11] = 1;

setSkillLevel(11, 1, playerLevel[11]);
playerLevel[12] = 1;

setSkillLevel(12, 1, playerLevel[12]);

playerLevel[13] = 1;

setSkillLevel(13, 1, playerLevel[13]);

playerLevel[14] = 1;

setSkillLevel(14, 1, playerLevel[14]);
playerLevel[15] = 1;

setSkillLevel(15, 1, playerLevel[15]);

playerLevel[16] = 1;

setSkillLevel(16, 1, playerLevel[16]);

playerLevel[17] = 1;

setSkillLevel(17, 1, playerLevel[17]);
playerLevel[18] = 1;

setSkillLevel(18, 1, playerLevel[18]);
playerLevel[19] = 1;

setSkillLevel(19, 1, playerLevel[19]);

playerLevel[20] = 1;

setSkillLevel(20, 1, playerLevel[20]);
playerLevel[21] = 1;

setSkillLevel(21, 1, playerLevel[21]);[/code][br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:03:13 AM[/size][hr]common where r all the smart coders? I need help soon.
